8 Assessing the pelvis:
 ∙ Try to reach the sacral promontory if the head is not engaged. If the sacral promontory is felt, the 
pelvis is contracted. Refer the women to FRU for specialist care.
 ∙ If the sacral promontory is not felt, trace downward and feel for sacral hollow. A well curved 
sacrum is favourable.
 ∙ Spread your two fingers to feel the ischial spines. If both ischial spines can be felt at same t
